entry.title: Monday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Periods of drizzle beginning this evening then changing to showers after midnight. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 15.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 in the morning. High 15. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
